descriptionHtml:
====================================
BETTER FRECKLES
====================================
Author: MadCat221 (MadCat221@gmail.com)

Version: 1.0

December 24, 2011

1. Introduction
2. Version History

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============

A look at the freckles complexion setting in the CharGen slider reveals that it may be more accurate to call it the \"Rosaeca\" complexion.  The red splotches are far more conspicuous than the freckles are by a longshot.

So I busted out the Nagel Series 37 freckle brush and made a replacer.

==================
2. VERSION HISTORY
==================

v1: 
Initial Release. 

v1.0.1 (March 23, 2012)
Decompressed it as the DXT compression caused some artifacting that made the freckles look... bad.  If you have VRAM issues, the old compressed version will be kept available.
author: MadCat221
